record.field:
Dear ${object.employee_id.lone_manager_id.name},


The Below Employee has raised a travel request

Emp Name: ${object.employee_id.employee_id} ${object.employee_id.name}

TR NO: ${object.name}

Advance Amount Status: ${object.travel_advance}
Advance Amount : ${object.approved_advance}
Priority : ${object.priority_type}
From Date: ${object.date_from}
% if object.date_to: To Date: ${object.date_to}
% endif No of Days: ${object.no_of_days}
Location From: ${object.from_location_id.name}
Location To : ${object.to_location_id.name}
Travel Type : ${object.travel_type}
Travel Mode : ${object.travel_mode_id.name}

Regards,

ERP AUTOMATION

This is a system generated email, do not reply to this email ID

Dear ${object.employee_id.name},


Your travel request is rejected due to the following reason.

Reason : ${object.name}
Travel ID : ${object.travel_id.name}
From Date : ${object.travel_id.date_from}
% if object.date_to: To Date : ${object.travel_id.date_to}
% endif No of Days : ${object.travel_id.no_of_days}
Location From : ${object.travel_id.from_location_id.name}
Location To : ${object.travel_id.to_location_id.name}
Travel Type : ${object.travel_id.travel_type}

Regards,

ERP AUTOMATION

This is a system generated email, do not reply to this email ID

Dear ${object.employee_id.lone_manager_id.name},


The Below Employee has Cancelled a travel request due to

Reason : ${object.name}
Travel ID : ${object.travel_id.name}
From Date : ${object.travel_id.date_from}
% if object.date_to: To Date : ${object.travel_id.date_to}
% endif No of Days : ${object.travel_id.no_of_days}
Location From : ${object.travel_id.from_location_id.name}
Location To : ${object.travel_id.to_location_id.name}
Travel Type : ${object.travel_id.travel_type}

Regards,

ERP AUTOMATION

This is a system generated email, do not reply to this email ID

Dear ${object.employee_id.hod_id.name},


The Below Employee has Cancelled a travel request due to

${object.emp_remarks}

Req ID: ${object.name}
Emp Name: ${object.employee_id.employee_id} ${object.employee_id.name}
Advance Amount Status: ${object.travel_advance}
Advance Amount : ${object.approved_advance}
Priority : ${object.priority_type}
From Date: ${object.date_from}

Location To : ${object.to_location_id.name}
Travel Type : ${object.travel_type}
Travel Mode : ${object.travel_mode_id.name}
Status : ${object.state}

Regards,

ERP AUTOMATION

This is a system generated email, do not reply to this email ID
